description: Global Architecture Configuration Repository (GACR) - Schema Integrity and Dependency Manifest (GEIDM). Tracks critical data schemas across the 2300+ codebase to ensure architectural coherence during autonomous refactoring.

critical_schemas.name: KernelStateSchema
critical_schemas.governs: Core system variables, maturity, and capability scores.

critical_schemas.name: NavigatorBlacklistSchema
critical_schemas.governs: File selection history and stability tracking.

critical_schemas.name: EmergentCapabilityMetadataSchema
critical_schemas.governs: Tracking autonomously invented algorithms and tools.

critical_schemas.name: AgentConfigurationSchema
critical_schemas.governs: Template for autonomous agent behavior patterns.
